round_best: Develop a meta-learning algorithm that automatically generates and optimizes calibration datasets for post-training pruning of language models based on their specific application domains and usage patterns. This algorithm would use transfer learning techniques to adapt knowledge from a broad range of models and tasks to predict the most impactful types of data for pruning efficacy. By refining calibration data in this targeted manner, the model would effectively learn to prune itself more efficiently under varied real-world conditions.
